resources.description: The Revenue Watch Index shows that about three-quarters (29 out of 41) of the countries provide scant or partial information about their extractive sector. This means that citizens are missing essential information to know how much their governments are profiting from the exploitation of state-owned natural resources. This table shows countries’ rankings and a breakdown by type of information.
resources.name: Revenue Watch Index

organization.description: Group for Economics data especially that which is [open data](http://opendefinition.org/). This can be any kind of data related to economics from development to finance, and micro to macro. We run an open group policy so anyone can add datasets to this group but we will review datasets added to the group for quality.
organization.title: Economics Datasets
organization.name: economics

name: revenue-watch-index-data
notes: The Revenue Watch Index shows that about three-quarters (29 out of 41) of the countries provide scant or partial information about their extractive sector. This means that citizens are missing essential information to know how much their governments are profiting from the exploitation of state-owned natural resources. This table shows countries’ rankings and a breakdown by type of information.
title: Revenue Watch Index Data
